title: Font 1 from 80's Audio manufacturer "Nakamichi"
content:
The only thing I can find in the FontBook is Agfa's 'Brazilia' and it looks too wide. It has a similar a, c & k, but the stem on the h is not quite so short (i.e. the x-height is lower than your sample).   
   
Of course, you said this is from the '80's, when more type was film or metal. This may not be easy..
author: bowfinpw

comments.content: There are a couple of faces from the '70s that look something like this (Baker Sans and Gerstner Program) but I think it was probably custom drawn.
with a nod to Optima in the thicks and thins.
